snippet: The taxi crashed into parked cars during the confrontation and a man and a woman were seen fleeing afterward, the police said.
abstract: Taxi driver is fatally stabbed in the eye by a passenger while driving in Brooklyn, causing the cab to crash into two parked cars; victim's name has not been released and police say no arrests have been made.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and TIM STELLOH

lead_paragraph: The taxi crashed into parked cars during the confrontation and a man and a woman were seen fleeing afterward, the police said.

headline.main: Cabdriver Fatally Stabbed by Passenger in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Cabdriver Is Fatally Stabbed by a Passenger
